name: Medici
tagline: Equal healthcare & insurance access to every Vietnamese
description: At Medici, we are encompassed by the belief: "Healthcare should be accessible, available and affordable for every Vietnamese." Since the launch of our business, we have been working ceaselessly to build a one-stop healthcare platform that connects Vietnamese with credible doctors, pharmaceutical products and insurance packages. Based in both Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, we have expanded our foothold to more than 30 provinces and cities, serving hundred thousands of customers while creating values for all partners across our value chain.
